meta.name: CPA Legacy Contracts
meta.description: Legacy Contracts for the Campaign-Play-Along pack.
meta.author: CPA Organizers

cards.name: Legacy of Dunwich
cards.text:
[reaction] When you complete the Dunwich Legacy CPA: Announce your completion in the Mythos Busters Discord server. The next time you participate in a CPA, you may accept this contract.
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, choose one card from the Dunwich Legacy expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Memories of Carcosa
cards.text:

cards.name: Expedition Log
cards.text:

Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, choose one card from the Edge of the Earth expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.
